raw_text:
Candidate 93
+91 9427399390
Email: candidate93@yahoo.com
Skype: candidate.93
Portfolio: 
Personal statement
A highly experienced and creative web developer with 11 years’ experience in a variety of exciting projects. A level head and rational approach to problem solving combined with a passion for innovative and fresh ideas has led to a portfolio of impressive website solutions. Technically competent and industry aware means that each project is undertaken with the most up-to-date and relevant programming foundations available.
Core skills
Experience of 11 years in PHP, MYSQL, CSS, XHTML and JavaScript
Experience with design pattern, architecture layouts and MVC frameworks like Zend, Laravel, Codeignitor, and Symfony.
Advance knowledge of JQuery, Bootstrap and Angular.
Expertise in Drupal, Magento, Wordpress and Joomla.
Rich experience on APIs like Amazon API, Google API, and RETS API
Worked on different types of payment processors like PayPal, authorize.net, Google checkout etc.
Experience with object-oriented software development methodologies
Integrating new technologies into web properties
Employment history
Sr. PHP Lead Developer – USA based Web Development Company
(Jan 2010 – Present)
Leading a small team on a variety of development projects and delivering solutions to meet and exceed clients’ briefs.
Worked on large scale of applications built on Drupal, Magento, Wordpress and Custom application development.
Duties
Outlining and presenting specifications for all web based requirements
Hands on development of all projects from genesis to delivery
Mentoring team members in development and technical progression
Writing multiple code and script and ensuring cross browser compliance
Trouble shooting and problem solving
Projects:
Drupal 8 :
Financial services application in multilingual environment.
Art Gallery application.
Drupal 6 and Drupal 7
LCEEQ
URL: 
Conference and workshop management.
Project duration: 10 Months
Fablab Inc.
URL: 
E-commerce and Production scheduling.
Project duration: 8 Months
RMGC
URL: http://www.rmgc.org
Golf Club members’ management application.
Project duration: 6 Months
CMS Websites:
PHP Projects:
Team Leader – Silver touch Technologies LTD.
(Apr 2007 – Dec 2009)
Duties
Monitoring the overall progression of department and staff
Maintaining performance of client websites
Suggesting improvements on design and functionality
Diagnosing and rectifying performance issues
Providing aftercare support for clients on assessing the performance of their sites
Web Developer – Fusion Informatics PVT LTD.
(Jun 2005 – Mar 2007)
Duties
Maintaining continuity throughout all websites both technically and creatively
Education
(2001 – 2005)
B.E (IT)
Please do not hesitate to contact me if you require references from any of my previous employers.
